Baozun Inc provides e-commerce solutions for brand partners in the People's Republic of China.

It offers end-to-end e-commerce solutions, including IT infrastructure setup and integration, online store design and setup, store operations, visual merchandizing and marketing campaigns, customer services, warehousing, and order fulfillment.

relations.sentence: Look Past Natural Disasters to Gauge Health of Japan's Economy

results.text: “The prolonged trade war and China’s slowdown are making the clouds over the outlook thicker and thicker,” said Yoshiki Shinke, chief economist at Dai-Ichi Life Research Institute.

semantic_roles.sentence: (Bloomberg) -- A string of natural disasters that battered Japan in the third quarter are almost certain to have pushed the economy into reverse, making the size of the pullback and any signs of trade-war impact the things to watch.

subject.text: A string of natural disasters that battered Japan in the third quarter

Economists polled by Bloomberg estimate gross domestic product to have contracted an annualized 1 percent from the second quarter, when it grew by 3 percent.

If this is the case, it will be a big challenge for Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, who less than a month ago committed to a sales-tax increase next year on the assumption that the economy will continue its mostly solid growth.

object.text: a big challenge for Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, who less than a month ago committed to a sales-tax increase next year on the assumption that the economy will continue its mostly solid growth

semantic_roles.sentence: If exports, consumption and production are weighing down the economy, it will leave a lot of heavy lifting for capital spending to prop up growth in the coming quarters.

semantic_roles.sentence: If exports, consumption and production are weighing down the economy, it will leave a lot of heavy lifting for capital spending to prop up growth in the coming quarters.

semantic_roles.sentence: Nov 13 (Reuters) - Australian shares tumbled on Tuesday as concerns over slowing global growth continued to undercut equities, with a sell-off in tech stocks on Wall Street leading a broad risk-off move globally.

Nov 13 (Reuters) - Australian shares tumbled on Tuesday as concerns over slowing global growth continued to undercut equities, with a sell-off in tech stocks on Wall Street leading a broad risk-off move globally.
The S&P/ASX 200 index fell 98.3 points or 1.65 percent to 5,843 by 0100 GMT.

semantic_roles.sentence: Losses were broad-based as local technology and financial shares tracked an overnight slide in their peers on Wall Street and lost more than 2 percent each.

semantic_roles.sentence: Information technology stocks Appen and Wisetech Global shed about 5 percent apiece.
Australia's financial sub-index slid the most in nearly three weeks, with all of the large-cap lenders trading in the red.

semantic_roles.sentence: Westpac Banking Corp led the losses with a 5.7 percent decline as the stock traded ex-dividend.

semantic_roles.sentence: Metals and mining stocks were also a big drag on the market, with heavyweight miners BHP and Rio Tinto shedding about 1.5 percent and 2 percent respectively.

subject.text: by concerns over slowing global demand for metals

semantic_roles.sentence: Mining stocks have been hit especially hard by concerns over slowing global demand for metals.
Falling commodity prices have only added to the pressure.
Falling commodity prices have only added to the pressure.

Baozun Inc provides e-commerce solutions for brand partners in the People's Republic of China.

It offers end-to-end e-commerce solutions, including IT infrastructure setup and integration, online store design and setup, store operations, visual merchandizing and marketing campaigns, customer services, warehousing, and order fulfillment.
